page.description: The following Embedded Browse properties can be changed at run-time.

section.title: Filter and Order Properties
section.description: An embedded browse does not have its own filter and order properties. An embedded browse displays the records selected for the underlying table or set.

case.title: Object Name
case.description: The name of the control.

case.title: Primary Table
case.description: The primary table that the form is bound to.

case.title: Embed browse layout
case.description: Determines whether the embedded browse is part of the form or another existing browse is displayed.

case.title: Use named browse layout
case.description: The name of the existing browse that is being displayed on the form.

case.title: Specify browse by expression
case.description: An expression that selects fields to display in the browse.

case.title: Read Only
case.description: When checked prevents the user from modifying any data visible in the browse.

case.title: Hide
case.description: Displays or hides the embedded browse.

case.title: Always on Top
case.description: When checked the control is always on the top-most level of the form layout. No other form elements will over lap it.

case.title: Tab Stop
case.description: Determines whether you can tab to the embedded browse.

case.title: Disable
case.description: Enables or disables the embedded browse.

case.title: Left
case.description: Sets the horizontal position of the control.

case.title: Top
case.description: Sets the vertical position of the control.

case.title: Width
case.description: Sets the width of the control.

case.title: Height
case.description: Sets the height of the control.

case.title: Anchor
case.description: Determines the way the tabbed control will or will not stretch as the base form is resized. Possible attachment points are: 1 = top and right 2 = top, left, and right 4 = bottom and left 5 = bottom and right 6 = bottom, left, and right 8 = top, bottom, and left 9 = top, bottom, and right 10 = top, bottom, left, and right
Display horizontal scrollbar.
Display vertical scrollbar.
Display row selector.
Display column titles.
Display horizontal gridlines.
Display vertical gridlines.
Whether to highlight the current row.
Parent records only (display only the top level table in a set).
Enable or disable column delete.
Enable or disable column move.
Enable or disable column resize.
Enable or disable splitting of the browse.
Enable or disable the ability to change records.
Enable or disable the ability to delete records.
Enable or disable the ability to add records.
Enables or disables functions under the Find menu.
Enables or disables functions under the Query menu.
Enables or disables select index.
Enables or disables select range.
Enables or disables editing of the browse layout.
Enables or disables outline commands.

case.title: New Record Line
case.description: The prompt that indicates that you can enter a new record.

case.title: Row Selector Color
case.description: The background color of the row selector (using a color name or RGB value ).

case.title: Browse Splitter Color
case.description: The color of the splitter (using a color name or RGB value ).

case.title: Browse Background Color
case.description: The background color of the browse (using a color name or RGB value ).

case.title: Border Style
case.description: Sets the border line style.

case.title: Border Color
case.description: Sets the border line color (using a color name or RGB value ).

case.title: Border Edge Shape
case.description: Sets the shape of the border.

case.title: Border Width
case.description: The width of the border line in pixels.

case.title: Show Left, Right, Top, Bottom
case.description: For edge shape "Square" determines which sides of the rectangle will display. For other edge shapes, determines which corners will be square or styled.
case.example: :formname.browsename.border.has_bottom_edge as L :formname.browsename.border.has_left_edge as L :formname.browsename.border.has_right_edge as L :formname.browsename.border.has_top_edge as L

case.title: Shadow Style
case.description: Determines how much the shadow will be offset and its degree of shading.

case.title: Shadow Color
case.description: Sets the shadow color (using a color name or RGB value ).

case.title: Background Style
case.description: The fill color mode and translucency of the control's background.

case.title: Fill
case.description: The style and color(s) of the control's background.
case.example: :formname.browsename.fill.backcolor as C :formname.browsename.fill.forecolor as C :formname.browsename.fill.style as C

case.title: Column Titles
case.description: Displays or hides the column titles.

case.title: Font
case.description: Determines the font of the column titles.

case.title: Size
case.description: Determines the point size of the column titles.

case.title: Bold, Underline, Italic, Strikeout
case.description: Sets the character styles of the column titles.
case.example: :formname.browsename.Title.Font.Italic as L :formname.browsename.Title.Font.Bold as L :formname.browsename.Title.Font.Strikeout as L :formname.browsename.Title.Font.Underline as L

case.title: Color
case.description: Sets the color of the title font. See A5.COLOR_ENUM().

case.title: Background
case.description: Sets the color of the background. See A5.COLOR_ENUM().

case.title: Column Titles
case.description: Determines which right click menu to display.

case.title: Row Height
case.description: Sets the height a browse row.
